glsa.title: sandbox: Insecure temporary file handling
glsa.synopsis: The sandbox utility may create temporary files in an insecure manner.

background.p: sandbox is a Gentoo Linux utility used by the Portage package management system.

description.p: The Gentoo Linux Security Audit Team discovered that the sandbox utility was vulnerable to multiple TOCTOU (Time of Check, Time of Use) file creation race conditions.

impact.p: Local users may be able to create or overwrite arbitrary files with the permissions of the root user.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All sandbox users should upgrade to the latest version:
